Text:
Pardon me asking, but was the source an untouched blu-ray disk, or is this a re-encode?

Just making sure. Thanks :)
im using western dig tv live box and cant view the subs

Subtitles are actually included, but your player may not support the format (.sup). The solution is to extract the subtitle stream using mkvextract, covert it to a different format that your player does support, such as .srt, and then repack using mkvmerge. I personally converted the .sup file to .srt using BDSupToSub.

Good download. As viewed on 1920x1080 laptop screen  A: 8
            V: 8

If subs don't work, just google breaking bad season 3 subtitles...worked for me.
